getLevel

long getLevel(java.lang.String ctx,
              java.lang.String key)
Return the logging level mask.

Specified by:
getLevel in interface LogConfig
Parameters:
ctx - a context name
key - a filter key
Returns:
the enabled severity level mask for context ctx and key key, with a non-zero sign bit (set bit of LogConfig.SET_MARKER) or 0L if the mask is not defined

isLevelEnabled

boolean isLevelEnabled(java.lang.String ctx,
                       java.lang.String key,
                       int lev)
Indicate whether a particular logging level is enabled.

Specified by:
isLevelEnabled in interface LogConfig
Parameters:
ctx - a context name
key - a filter key
lev - a severity level
Returns:
true iff logging for the severity level lev is enabled, for context ctx and key key
